title: IAB330 Hospital Staff and Patient Tracker
description: This project is an assignment for IAB330, focusing on the development of an IoT-based hospital tracking system. The system is designed to keep track of hospital staff and patients within various rooms using RFID tags. It consists of a React app for the user interface and a Node.js server to handle RFID tag data processing. The React app displays real-time information on the whereabouts of staff and patients, improving hospital workflow and patient care.
